title: Novell Groupwise WebAccess Multiple Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary client side script 
on vulnerable installations of Novell Groupwise WebAccess. Authentication is not
required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within handling html messages sent to a Novell Groupwise
WebAccess user. Messages are improperly sanitized allowing client side script to 
be supplied to the user's web browser resulting in the user's WebAccess credentials
being  compromised.
timeline:
2010-04-05 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2010-07-20 - Coordinated public release of advisory
